claim: Flublok is approved for adults 18 years and older
explanation: The screenshot of the Flublok® Quadrivalent prescribing information shows the “Indications and Usage” section.  It explicitly states that FluBlok Quadrivalent is indicated “for active immunization of persons 18 years of age and older against influenza disease caused by influenza virus A subtypes and B viruses contained in the vaccine formulation.”  This directly confirms that FluBlok is approved for adults 18 years and older.
